description: This skill will generate a technology statement using a large collection of buzzwords.  You can ask it to repeat it's last statement, or have it generate a new one.  Just say, "Alexa ask Tech Buzz to tell me something smart" and it'll give you a very intelligent sounding response.  Then you can either say 'Yes' to generate another, 'Repeat' to hear it again, or 'No' to end the conversation.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Tech Buzz to tell me something smart
Alexa, ask Tech Buzz what is a smart thing to say
Alexa, ask Tech Buzz to say something smart
name: Technology Buzzword Generator
shortDescription: Generates a technology statement with the latest in technology buzzwords.
